Author: especiallygirlgiants
Text: I really don’t think getting off the ride is an option. I wish I never got on. You stay strong too - thank you

Author: ri-ri
Text: I’m so sorry you’re going through this.  I honestly feel the same. I “recovered” but I realize this ED is a crippling rollercoaster that has its ups, downs, and spirals.  I’m not sure if there’s an option to get off the ride.  Stay strong.
